title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame). Additionally, the tab key does not function properly.
OB: On March 26, 2002, on a Windows 2000 machine, when I launch the Help view, the tab key does not have any effect.
SR: On March 26, 2002, on a Windows 2000 machine, to reproduce this issue, launch the Help view and try to navigate using the tab key.
